metadata.title: RHSA-2018:3052: wget security and bug fix update (Moderate)
metadata.description:
The wget packages provide the GNU Wget file retrieval utility for HTTP, HTTPS, and FTP protocols.

Security Fix(es):

* wget: Cookie injection allows malicious website to write arbitrary cookie entries into cookie jar (CVE-2018-0494)

For more details about the security issue(s), including the impact, a CVSS score, and other related information, refer to the CVE page(s) listed in the References section.

Additional Changes:

For detailed information on changes in this release, see the Red Hat Enterprise Linux 7.6 Release Notes linked from the References section.

bugzilla.text: wget: Cookie injection allows malicious website to write arbitrary cookie entries into cookie jar

criterions.comment: Red Hat Enterprise Linux 7 is installed
wget is signed with Red Hat redhatrelease2 key
Red Hat Enterprise Linux must be installed
